attributes.action: ask Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II to dissolve Parliament immediately and allow a general election in the wake of the MP expenses scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition asking the Queen to immediately dissolve Parliament to allow a general election to be held so that the citizens of the United Kingdom can act against MPs who have abused the parliamentary expenses system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
